description: When the winds are raging on the ridgeline, it's your lead on a wet ice pitch, or the conditions suddenly take a turn for the worse, the Quasar Lite™ Gore-Tex Active Jacket quickly deploys for durable and technical waterproof breathable performance—perfect for backcountry ski tours, light-and-fast alpine climbs, and streamlined peak-bagging missions.
name: Mountain Hardwear Quasar Lite GTX Active Jacket - Mens
